title: Is Joe Biden an idealist? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Joe Biden always has and always will be is just one more “empty suit caree politician”, and a wise ass to boot. He’ll tell you anything, to get what he wants. And as is for most, what he wanted is “money, prestige and power!”. He’s been a robot for his political donors and now also for the leftist ideologue’s that are the base of the Democratic Party. All you have to look at is; his multi million dollar estate and the mass of he and his families accumulated wealth. Not bad, for two bit senator from Deleware that graduated near the bottom of his class in law school.

Joe Biden has achieved far too much in the nasty world of politics to be considered “idealistic”. He’s a classic liberal (like John Kennedy or Hubert Humphrey) and an extremely competent professional politician (as was his former boss, Barack Obama) and a pragmatist.
